about_the_game:
DISCLAIMER

Portal Escape Chamber is a free DLC for Escape Simulator, made by Pine Studio and based on the fictitious “Aperture Science” from Valve’s beloved Portal games.

Portal Escape Chamber

Explore the detailed environment of the mysterious subdivision of Aperture Science Laboratories!

Intricate Puzzles

Solve perplexing new puzzles and devices, in this content packed escape-room!

Suit Up!

Working in a laboratory requires the correct gear! Put on your brand new Aperture Science lab coat and start exploring!

FEATURE LIST

  • Brand new Portal inspired escape-room packed with fresh puzzles.
  • New Aperture Science Laboratories character skins.
  • Play solo or online with friends. The DLC plays best with 1-4 players, but it's playable with up to 10!
  • The room is huge so we implemented a new save system.
  • The estimated gameplay time is 90 minutes!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux <3
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+ or Vulkan-capable GPU
  • Storage: 16 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: X64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal-capable GPU
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game works great on the new M1 Mac!
